description: This table stores the list of patient contacts that should be billed as part of a bundled episode.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bundled episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: VISIT_CSN
columns.description: The contact serial number of the patient contact that should be billed as part of the bundled episode.

columns.name: BND_EPSD_VISIT_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the category ID of the source that indicated that the associated visit should be billed as part of the bundled episode.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Clinical


Billing Manual Override


Link Automation


Link Automation, Manual Clinical

columns.name: VISIT_UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who last associated the visit that should be billed as part of the bundled episode.

columns.name: VISIT_UPDATE_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time that the user last associated the visit that should be billed as part of the bundled episode.

columns.name: DEFINES_CLIN_LINK_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the billing link is the reason the episode is linked on the clinical side (i.e. it hasn't ever been linked or unlinked directly from the clinical side)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
